meanings.definition: Made to conform to a particular style.
meanings.sent1: The artist created a stylized painting with bold colors and sharp lines.
meanings.sent2: The movie featured stylized costumes that perfectly matched the 1920s era.
meanings.sent3: The stylized car looked like it belonged in a cartoon rather than on the road.
meanings.sent4: Her dance moves were so stylized, they seemed like they came straight out of a music video.
meanings.sent5: The logo was so stylized that it became instantly recognizable to everyone.

meanings.definition: Represented in a non-realistic or abstract way.
meanings.sent1: The artist's stylized interpretation of the city skyline was both unique and captivating.
meanings.sent2: The play used stylized movements to convey the emotions of the characters.
meanings.sent3: The stylized clouds in the painting looked like fluffy cotton candy in the sky.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a stylized quality that made it stand out from the rest of the singers.
meanings.sent5: The sculpture was so stylized that it almost seemed to defy gravity.
